{"id":867491667,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1672316982,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/867491667/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"8.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char, int> arr;\n        arr['I'] = 1;\n        arr['V'] = 5;\n        arr['X'] = 10;\n        arr['L'] = 50;\n        arr['C'] = 100;\n        arr['D'] = 500;\n        arr['M'] = 1000;\n\n        int l = s.length();\n        int i = 0;\n        int ans = 0;\n        while(i != l){\n            if(i+1 < l && s[i] == 'I' && s[i+1] == 'V'){ans += 4; i+=2;}\n            else if(i+1 < l && s[i] == 'I' && s[i+1] == 'X'){ans += 9; i+=2;}\n            else if(i+1 < l && s[i] == 'X' && s[i+1] == 'L'){ans += 40; i+=2;}\n            else if(i+1 < l && s[i] == 'X' && s[i+1] == 'C'){ans += 90; i+=2;}\n            else if(i+1 < l && s[i] == 'C' && s[i+1] == 'D'){ans += 400; i+=2;}\n            else if(i+1 < l && s[i] == 'C' && s[i+1] == 'M'){ans += 900; i+=2;}\n            else{\n                ans += arr[s[i]];\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
